website_summaries.verdict: An affordable bar stool duo that offers stylish looks and solid construction – you won't find a better set for a lower price.
pros: Basic yet attractive –showcases a contrasting white frame and gray upholstered seat with 29-inch height
Comes in a set of 2 stools
cons: Rare reports of stitching coming loose after a short time and cushion sagging in the middle

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: We were in the market to find barstools that matched out decor and our taste, but everything we found was super expensive. We saw these on Amazon and thought they looked great and the price is unbeatable! I didn't get too excited about them because I thought there must be something about them that made them such a great price (i.e. cheaply made or poor quality), but once we put them together we were pleasantly surprised!!! We absolutely LOVE them! They are super sturdy, the top leather seat is soft and durable, the white legs are solid and just everything about them is perfect. We would buy them again in a heartbeat. Definitely recommend these barstools. :)
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Easy Assembly! Looks Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, these stools are just gorgeous and much better than I expected them to be for the price. It took less than a week to get to me and I assembled them myself in about 30 minutes. They include an Allen Wrench for the leg screws but you will need your own Phillips Head screwdriver for the screws on the footrests. The legs are level and the grey faux leather came without any blemishes or rips. I’m definitely going to order a couple more for the kitchen side of my breakfast counter.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Smith

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME quality stools
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME quality stools!.... I was surprised by house nice, and god quality these stools were. EASY to put together, I did it myself, took about 30mins for both. VERRY EASY! (I surprised myself), as I have arthritis, and diff sitting on the floor, but had no problem putting these together! :) Thrilled w quality, and no wobbles. Just pay attention to sides, and make sure they are facing in correct position. I followed the advise of another reviewer and it was very helpful! SOOOOO HAPPY I took a chance on these! Thank you! (AND all the parts were included! a BONUS!) :)
customer_reviews.author: SqueakyMom23

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Love these counter height barstools. We purchased the gray wood with white seats and they're very nice. Took about 20 minutes to assemble each of them. They are a perfect compliment to our gray flooring and quartz countertops and white kitchen countertops. Highly recommend them --- they are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Overstreet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for a beautiful product!
customer_reviews.text: Paid $107 dollars for a set of 2 beautifully crafted white stools with grey leather seats. I was shocked how well-built and easy to assemble these products were. The manufacturer even had the fore-sight to install plastic feet on the bottom of the legs to prevent scratches and keep the surface even. We bought two sets of 2, and all four of the stools were identical in build quality and sturdiness. Not a single one wobbled or creaked once assembled, and did I mention they are beautiful? We priced similar stools out at a local home goods store, and they were easily $30 dollars more, each! Be sure to measure and get the proper height to match your counters.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: High quality, super comfortable, very durable. So pleased with these! Reviewers who say the bars were in different positions put it together wrong. I started putting the second one together wrong and noticed the bars were at different heights, re-did it and it was fine . The key is when the seat is upside down as you put it together, the label should be facing you words up, and then follow the directions exactly on which bars to put on which side. Overall, these are a great.
customer_reviews.author: jdubbins

customer_reviews.title: Look awesome. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: We love this. Some Assembly required but very easy. My 13 year old did some of them. Great price. Cheaper here then on other sites. Love my Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: T. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking and Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: These stools are sturdy, nice looking and easy to put together. I have tried tipping them and they seem to be pretty tip- proof for normal sitting. After reading some of the reviews I was afraid they were fabric covered but they appear to be a heavy PU covering. They make a nice addition to my newly renovated kitchen. The color is bright white with gray upholstery as described.
customer_reviews.author: Winniesmom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stools for the price.
customer_reviews.text: We have had these stools for over a month now and are satisfied with them. They blend very well in our white and gray kitchen. However, they are a little short for comfortable eating at our bar height counter. If they were available a couple of inches higher they would be perfect. The quality seems to be very good, considering the reasonable price compared to other similar stools. The assembly process was somewhat time consuming, but not overly difficult. Based on their appearance, quality and price I would recommend these stools.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, great value and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these stools! They match my decor perfectly and they’re very comfortable and sturdy. Took my husband no time to assemble. My husband is 6’3” and weighs over 250...my son is 6’2 and the center for his varsity football team and they use the chairs all of the time...so I assume the chair can hold 300 lbs. Best of all my 3 year olds juice stains clean right up with a little Clorox cleaner. Absolutely love!
customer_reviews.author: MD79

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these barstools. We were looking for barstools to compliment our custom made bar and we were lucky to find these. They were easy to assemble and look great.
customer_reviews.author: robin Williams

customer_reviews.title: Better To Be Lucky Than Good
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these as an add-on to an island cart for the kitchen. They are perfect. We have a an antique copper metal tile back splash between the cabinets and counter tops in our kitchen. The color on these says "tan" seat cushions on white wood frame and that's how they look in the pics. But when they showed up the cushions have a bit of a coppery/gold sheen to the fabric that is even a better match in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ken

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, cute design, very comfortable. Faux leather seats make for a comfortable sit while you are enjoying your meal. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but beware color differences!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy stools for the price. The problem we have is that the upholstery is different colors on the pair that came in the same box. One is darker than the other, and although they are nice, I am disappointed that they are not a matching set. You can definitely see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: They are the correct size, look great, plenty comfortable, easy to assemble, and stable enough to stand on. The thing I love most is that they slide really easily when nobody is sitting on them, so I can scoot them out of the way with ease. EXACTLY WHAT I WANTED!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Master Paku

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Received them last night. I ordered 2 pairs, a total of 4. On my first assembly, I was following the instructions on the manual but couldn't angle the feet. I had to unscrew and play around their matches. I had them figured out! Quality is nice and they are less than a hundred bucks for a pair. They are definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sid Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set of these for our kitchen countertop area. They arrived very well packaged and safe for transport. The stools were easy to assemble and came with all hardware. There were not chips or dents on the product. The seat itself is very thick and extremely comfortable, and wide enough for a bigger buttocks. The entire stool is sturdy and comfortable for use. Would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, fast shipping, easy to assemble and the look is amazing! They look expensive. Great price. I’d highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So in love!!
customer_reviews.text: Once I saw these barstools I wanted them. Then they arrived and I put them together which was super simple everything you need came with the barstools by the way. I feel even more in love with them. They are super sturdy and look amazing. Such a great product and would recommend them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love the cushions. Everything about these stools are elegant. I got the set of two for a studio I'm renting out. Can't wait to get feedback from tenant. I wish I had somewhere to put more, I'd get them. Very easy to put together. For some reason the first set had an issue with the big screws so I sent it back and this set went right together.
customer_reviews.author: J. M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these stools! We just started renovating our kitchen and these stools were absolutely perfect for our new color scheme. Not only is the price right, but they are surprisingly sturdy. Obviously time will tell with how they hold up, but even my husband after he assembled them was impressed at the quality. I will definitely update if anything changes in the future.
customer_reviews.author: NYer523

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Look great! And comfy. The only problem is they came scratched on the legs. Took all but 30 minutes to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Sharlitha Reed

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Crafted and Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Package was only 29lbs which lead me to worry that they might not be substantial enough. I have attached several pictures because from unboxing to final assembly they surpassed all of my expectations. It was super easy to assemble. I would recommend getting a good screwdriver beforehand so you won’t be unprepared. I paid for these stools and I doubt my opinion is worth enough to get someone to pay me for it.. I just really love these stools! They look luxurious and for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Dej

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I just moved into a new house and did the kitchen in white and grays and was looking for something that would me comfortable and match well. These were PERFECT! I bought two sets and it took me less than 15 minutes to assemble all four.
customer_reviews.author: Christine AE2

customer_reviews.title: The glides will fall off and destroy your beautiful hardwood floor
customer_reviews.text: The white paint does not cover the wood. They are all streaky and you can see wood under paint. Holes don't line up, missing floor glides. The glides will fall off and destroy your beautiful hardwood floor. They are not wide enough to shallow of a seat and we are not big people. They will fall over very easy. My 5 year old fits fine on them. You get what you pay for and these are total junk!
customer_reviews.author: My Opinion!

customer_reviews.title: Love these stools!
customer_reviews.text: These stools are absolutely great and look perfect at my kitchen peninsula! The gray seats provide a wonderful contrast to the predominantly white kitchen. They have glides on the bottom of each leg that make for easy movement without leaving marks or having to use those nasty looking stick-on pads that always move & sometimes come off. They are well made and are very much worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica H. Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a broken leg
customer_reviews.text: 1 stool came broken. The other stool, the legs were slightly uneven so it did rock back and forth on the ground. But cosmetically, other than being broken and/or wobbly, they look good.
customer_reviews.author: Skp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product Excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for an upholstered bar stool for quite some time but had been put off by prices & styles. These are not only gorgeous, but the price for 2 was better than most prices for just 1. Super easy to assemble, took less than 5 minutes. Didn't need 2, but like I said, the price for 2 was fantastic. Very sturdy & so very nice to look at. Would definitely purchase again. I would highly recommend this product. No issues what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: smartshopper

customer_reviews.title: Good chairs for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We have had these for over a year now. They get daily use from the four people here. After a year here are my thoughts: Pros: Easy to keep clean Looks much more expensive than they are Get many compliments on them The white on the legs doors not chip off Cons: The nuts they come with need to be tightened up every other month or so, but that takes all of 5 minutes to do all 4 chairs The cushion on the seat is not great, and over this past year it is flattened out a lot, but when nobody is sitting on them, they look all nice and cushy!
customer_reviews.author: PureLuck

customer_reviews.title: GREAT isn't even the word!
customer_reviews.text: These stools are truly remarkable in every respect. Real wood, real leather and very beautiful!. They are also very comfortable as the cushion is beyond thick. We just completely remodeled our kitchen and these are a wonderful accent to it. I've literally bought thousands of items at Amazon and I believe this is my best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: These were pretty easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: These were pretty easy to put together. It took some effort to get the last set of screws in because there were no pre-drilled holes. Have the elbow grease ready if you don't have an electric drill. Comfort-wise, pretty OK but not great. The foam inside the cushion is easily compressed, but it's better than a solid wood top. They're attractive stools and seem durable 2 weeks into their use. I appreciated the careful packaging of the pieces for shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be Happier!
customer_reviews.text: I read a few reviews and some complained about unstability and not a good value. I TOTALLY DISAGREE! I took my time and made sure every screw was tightened as much as I could. I put the chairs on my kitchen floor and both were as stable as could be. A great buy....everything was machined well and fit perfectly. I would definitely buy again. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, solid stools
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my new kitchen island and couldn't be more pleased. The cushions are thick and comfortable and have a nice, smooth finish that will be easy to clean. My 11-year-old son was able to put them together for me by himself with a little help tightening down the bolts. I love the blue color and they are very sturdy. Great deal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie K

customer_reviews.title: Loooove at 1st sight
customer_reviews.text: Have minor minuses on the inside.like the wood is sticking out on some sides. But outside they look amazing and very strong! Could not have picked a better chair. Assembly is a breeze and after 1 month use with my 2,5 year old - no problems. Just wipe them with a damo cloth and done. The white bottom only cleaned it 2 times-does not get as dirty as I thought it would! Loooove
customer_reviews.author: sorina panfil

customer_reviews.title: COMFY, STURDY AND STYLISH
customer_reviews.text: If I could give these stools a 10 out of 5, I would! Very comfy, very stylish, not too hard to put together and a great price. They look great in my apartment and I've used them a lot since assembly. They look great and are very comfortable to sit on. I'd highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Time2upgrade

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a few months now so I can truly say these bar stools are awesome! I put them together by myself and think it took about 30 minutes to finish both. The instructions were easy enough I just had some difficulty getting the screws to go straight into the angled slots. But all in all they are sturdy and do the job. The leather cushion top had some small white specks that I initially thought was dust or something but no they are permanently there. Not a huge issue since they are so small, but good to note. They are the perfect height for our island and the cushion top is comfortable. So happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Ann D.Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: WOW...what a deal ! !
customer_reviews.text: wife ordered these for our newly remodeled kitchen, where we lowered our eating bar to counter height...these stools were exactly as pictured and described...color of seat is as photo shows...the wood components appear to be of some kind of asian oak,so they feel pretty "weighty" and strong, without being too heavy...easy to assemble, even though we got the wrong instructions...assembly is self evident...actually my wife did it...be sure to have an allen wrench screw driver of some kind and a phillips head screw driver...a great value...they should serve us well...we are attaching foot rail protection by using clear plastic corners ( used for interior walls in your home), with 2 sided clear tape...get it at home depot paint depot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!!!  Not what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Stools we're very nice. The open box, open hardware scattered all over the box and no instructions were not. So 1.5 hours of my time to open...find screws and bolts and washers all over the box then on the phone with Amazon to find out they have no way to contact the manufacturer to find out if I even had all the parts...then more of my time to pack it back up to ship back. Not impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: Leah-Ann  Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Stitching coming out
customer_reviews.text: Overall these barstools look very nice. However, we have had them for less than three months and the stitching on one stool is starting to come out. There is no way to fix it and because the return window has passed no way to contact the seller. The other three stools are great, maybe we were just unlucky?
customer_reviews.author: joseph c smith

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: My original order got lost in shipment but Amazon was quick to make up for it and ship a new set out. These are very clean, pretty stools. The seat is nice to sit on and the height is perfect for my standard size island. A little leg assembly is required but nothing complicated. For the price this is a great set 👍
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: You can stand on them to install a ceiling fan!
customer_reviews.text: These look great at my shorter than bar height counter. This is actually my second set because my boys love this spot to sit and eat, play games, read , do homework, and just about everything else you can think of. Yep... just like it sounds these get ALOT of use!! I feel that I have gotten more that my use out of this set and they still look fair. The seats on my old set are a little worn after 2 years so the wife said it’s time for replacement and that’s the only reason for this second set.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Nazarowski

customer_reviews.title: Great Value - Fabulous Style!
customer_reviews.text: These stools are very nice! Came very well packaged. No damaged pieces. Pretty easy to assemble. Comfy, sturdy, and look great! Well worth this price!
customer_reviews.author: Judd Lormand

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice, sturdy barstools. They took me about an hour and a half to put together, but keep in mind I have a bad hand that doesn’t work too well after a car accident. They are not the most comfortable to sit on, but I mostly have them for show and to eat a snack or breakfast for a few minutes before work, so I don’t mind. Overall, I like them a lot. If I could buy one more individually I would, as I have room for one more at my island. Included a photo, please excuse the mess as I had just move into my new house when i took the photo.
customer_reviews.author: A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but be careful assembling
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking. Nice paint job. Parts fit together well. Pay close attention to the instructions. They are very easy to assemble incorrectly. I had to disassemble and reassemble to correct my error. The error in assembly was related to the cross-bars on the legs. On my first attempt the cross-bars ended up at different levels comparing the two stools. From the comments, it appears that I was not the only one that got it wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great stool and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great stool and comfortable. Only complaints are the smell (but after one night, the smell dissipated) and some of the holes for the screws were not finished well (quite a few splinters that made sweeping up an added chore).
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE STOOLS
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE STOOLS! We just bought a house and they are AMAZING. They are comfortable (who knew), stylish, sturdy and easy to put together. My husband did have to go after me and tighten all the screws (haha), but it was a breeze. It looks perfect in our kitchen with our quartz counter top. I looked for these stools in stores and the SAME exact ones were double or more the price. Definitely would recommend and just do it! They are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Starleigh

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it, it the screws are cheap and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love it, it the screws are cheap and the heads spin off too easily, which caused a lot of extra work and actually damaged a piece. I had to get my own screws to finish the job. I have no way to contact the seller so I'm forced to give this rating.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Stylish looking
customer_reviews.text: These were fairly easy to assemble - all tools are included. I was missing one lock washer from one set, but I just skipped it as I did not have any extras. The stools sit comfortably and look really nice. I did put felt pads on the bottom to protect wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Just as described--very easy to assemble (you only need a Phillips head screw driver--all other tools etc are provided. Only wish could purchase a single one separately as would prefer to have 3. They look very nice and are a great height for the kitchen counter. Would definitely recommend for the quality--am satisfied with the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but i felt the need to do so after putting together 3 of these stools this evening. I should preface this by saying i am a snob when it comes to buying wood furniture. I hate poorly constructed low quality products. This product is not. For the price the quality is amazing. You don't need directions to put these together. All you need to do is pig one leg on at a time loosly bolted. Once together, tighten up. I was also impressed with the quality of screws. I was worried about stripping the screws as i used my high powered dewalt driver. The screws survived and did not strip. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stools!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice stools. Very nice wood, sturdy. Padding is firm. Very expensive looking stools for the price. They arrived well packaged, not a scratch or aberration on them. Came with all hardware and correct pieces. The only thing I did differently on the assembly was to glue as well as screw the four bottom support braces.
customer_reviews.author: David Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great stools
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and look very nice. My kitchen island is 6ft long and I have three of the four (I purchased two sets) at the island. My overhang is 11.5” and they fit nicely underneath it. I could fit the fourth stool under there also but I think the three looks nicer and gives more room. My island is 36” tall and the height of these stools works perfect for that. If I need the fourth one I will just bring it on over.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Aumand

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for countertop eating
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect stowaway stools for counter use. They match my kitchen perfectly but I decided to try my hand at distressing them, so mine are no longer stark white. I am very happy with how they turned out though and I think they look even better now. I used minwax classic grey for those interested and did a rough sanding prior to staining. Love the result and great price for the pair of these!
customer_reviews.author: mommymccarty

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service! Defective was shipped.
customer_reviews.text: One of the leg came in defective. It can easily tell this was production defective but not trucking damage. The leg is kind of like dry rot wood so the screw broke it from where the hole they wanted to dig. I’ve contacted the customer service couple times but received no updates on when they will send me a replacement leg! I’m so FRUSTRATED about this! It’s been two weeks now and If I don’t receive the replacement leg within next week, I’ll for sure return them even though the rest had already been installed.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Yee

customer_reviews.title: Cant even assemble. Legs are not the same.
customer_reviews.text: The idea of a stool is that all 4 legs need to be the same length!! And the pre drilled hole need to be the same length! Now I have to try to repack the damn things so they can go back. P.S. I cant tell you how comfortable they are cuz I cant put them together.
customer_reviews.author: JennyD1006

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stools, but you could get better elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful stools and they match my countertops perfectly. They where very easy to put together. I ordered two sets of them. The reason for the 4 start review though is one of the pieces was cracked. Also the 2nd set looked like it was hastily made, with some of the holes not drilled all the way through and spluttered wood painted over. Nothing you can see once put together, but grabbing it the wrong way I'm sure would be a surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Whiskey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice stools, great value.
customer_reviews.text: My expectations of a product are pretty high so maybe I should have rated them a five, but I felt that assembly, although easy for me, may not be as easy for others with less experience. I ordered six of them and all but one arrived without flaws. So to have two pieces of the last one replaced I reached out to the manufacturer through email. It took them a week to respond but when they did the parts were shipped immediately. So I'll stick with four stars because five would mean it was a perfect buying experience. However my wife and I love these stools very much, we were pleased with the price and would recommend buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Piccione

customer_reviews.title: Should have got 4. Help me "Order again"
customer_reviews.text: I received this product today and love the price and look. I went to "order again" and it says its not available and what is available is at least $50 more. How can I get the same deal as I did for the first two? Amazon seller help me out please :) Seriously I am in love with the product and will post pics once I get all four in place. The assembly was super easy and the cushions are sturdy and wide enough to handle even my bumm. Thanks for your time!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and built for larger persons.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stool for the price. Not inexpensive but a good value. Easy to install and everything was cut for a proper fit. I am a large man and it is very stable and comfortable to use at our kitchen counter. We bought 3 and they are so nice my wife moved one into our master at our counter to sit and put on make-up. I did not like the hard plastic floor protectors on the bottom of the legs so I took them off and put on stick on felt pads so it did not damage our laminate floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amaz1234

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic quality
customer_reviews.text: As you can see, 5 out of the 6 have torn and split apart on the seam in the middle. Only had them for about 6-8 months before they fell apart. Mostly little kids using these too. Looked nice and sturdy, but cheap fabric and terrible wear and tear. Would strongly suggest you find a different barstool.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and solid
customer_reviews.text: We had a different, cheaper set of stools that wobbled and made us uncomfortable. These are solid and add a nice pop of color to our room. The only issue I had, common nowadays, was the cheaply made screws. I busted the head off of 2 screws, so I have to take one back apart and get new screws. Be sure not to use a drill to tighten those screws; the heads can't take it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a very great quality bar stool. Perfect height for my kitchen bar and very easy to assemble. Looks exactly like the photo. Great quality and I love that the bottom of the legs have a small protector on them which makes them glide across my wood floors.i added an extra felt for extra protection. Love them! I purchased four and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Park Jimmin

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Stools
customer_reviews.text: These stools are prettier than I'd thought they'd be and perfect for the spot I needed. They are very sturdy but were easy to put together by myself. I love the color blue that they are. They seem to be of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Knoiwles

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Only had a few days so I'll update if it changes but consistently holding 250 lbs with no issues. Husband put both together in 30 min. **update ** these are still holding up well. They have held over 300 lbs when we have had family over....not consistently holding that much but they do just fine for the times they have. We do feel the padding is wearing down a little but I anticipate we still have plenty of use left and will be able to just redo the top portion when needed.
customer_reviews.author: SF513

customer_reviews.title: Terrible workmanship
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these bar stools. The first 2 I opened had the seats on crooked. The next 2 had threads hanging from the stitching. I ordered replacements for them and the next set came with little white paint like speckles on them. At first I thought it was powder, but it wouldn't rub off so I ended up returning all of them. I admit that they were nice looking stools and appeared to be sturdy, but the inconsistency in the workmanship made me uncomfortable keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased four of these in gray with white seats for my new home and absolutely love them. Many compliments from friends.
customer_reviews.author: Tellus

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for counter-height bar!
customer_reviews.text: These were a breeze to put together...all hardware and the tool included (though we did find it easier to use a drill.) They are cute, comfortable, and seem to be sturdy so far! 🤞🏼one of the bar connectors for the leg did have the pre-drilled screw holes missing, (wish I had taken a picture beforehand but completely forgot) but we just used the electric drill to create our own hole to hold these together. No problem!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy to put together.  Seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This was the best-organized-for-assembling product I've seen. Every part was labeled and packaged in an easy-to-find manner. Somebody put some thought into what it's like to navigate directions and parts. Good job! I only put these together today, but they seem very sturdy and have a comfortable seat. I'm happy with these seats!!!
customer_reviews.author: Morning Walker JT

customer_reviews.title: Got 5 of these for our big kitchen island.
customer_reviews.text: After putting them together wrong the first time, then re reading the directions they turned out great. There was a couple of holes that didn't line up perfect but with a little elbow grease and a drill we got em in. They look really nice compared to some of the ones we looked at in furniture stores and they're cheaper! I'd recommend these and hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Function, Form, and Looks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my new kitchen island. I wanted a nice counter stool that would fit under the overhang of the counter top. These will fit perfectly. They look and feel like fine leather, even though I know they are not. The price was right, and I purchased 4 of them. I'm 72, and I've built things all my life, so putting these together was a piece of cake... Oh, and yes, I'm a gramma... LOL
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great saddle barstools
customer_reviews.text: They look great under my counter and match the color scheme of my kitchen. They were pretty easy to put together, a little difficult to tighten the screws but nothing serious. I read other reviews that have had rips, I have had them for several weeks and my kids even get on them, no scratches or issues yet. My son colored on one with a crayon and we were able to clean it off easily. We got white wood and grey cushions, I like the style and the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Buy with pleasure, there worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I am not disappointed in buying these. I bought a set of six for my very large table. And they look and feel beautiful! I was surprised too at how well made and how inexpensive they were! Don’t be afraid to buy these stool. They look and feel amazing. There pretty sturdy too. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ivette

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! They were not very difficult to put together and feel very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant chairs with great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our recently renovated kitchen which has white countertops, so the color of the chairs matches our new kitchen perfectly! Great quality product but much cheaper compare to other competitors. I searched some popular furniture websites but the price is almost doubled compare to this one. It’s easy to put together with only 2 sets of screws. The chairs do have some smell from the paint / leather top, but it’s not too bad considering it’s a small piece. Also the dimension doesn’t seem to be very clearly described. Overall it’s a great looking chair with good quality and cheap price!!
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: ... for my son's remodeled kitchen and they are the perfect size and color for the space at the island
customer_reviews.text: I bought the grey on grey for my son's remodeled kitchen and they are the perfect size and color for the space at the island. The seats can be wiped clean with a damp cloth if necessary. The stools were easy to assemble. My 10 year old grandson and I put them together with very little difficulty... just had my son check to make sure we had tightened everything correctly, which we had!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi 2 5

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable seating but really tall!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these stoolS and they are really comfortable. I only marked it down one star on the assembly because one of the areas where the screw inserts was cracked. It’s not hugely noticeable and I don’t think it will impact long-term use. Unfortunately this still is just too tall for my peninsula. I have two 24 inch stools on each side and this one in the middle because 24 inch stools of this design were not sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: The style varies.  Sadly stools are not identical.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two sets of two stools. They are not completely identical. Take a look at the legs. Now I have 2 that do not match the other 2, and they stand in a line at my kitchen island. I hoped that all 4 would be identical. :(
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: These stools looked perfect in our new kitchen
customer_reviews.text: These stools looked perfect in our new kitchen! They were easy to assemble and are comfortable to sit on as well.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, stylish
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, stylish, elegant, and comfortable. The cushion gray is a darker grey, but it works perfectly because a lot of the other lighter gray stools we looked at were almost blue in color. Easy to assemble and love that it comes in a pack of two!
customer_reviews.author: vannemic

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality seats
customer_reviews.text: Cute and sturdy, but the leather tears apart at the seams in no time. I bought 4 and within a month, with very little use, all of them wear torn apart at the stitching. No way to fix it either so going in the trash
customer_reviews.author: beki

customer_reviews.title: Supports my butt
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty good for the price. These are not high-end materials, but they support my butt and match the new paint in my kitchen. Slight chemical smell when I opened the box but it seemed to fade as I assembled them (or I just got used to it). Like some other reviews said, mine both wobble slightly (like the legs aren’t exactly the same length). I’m sure this could be corrected by attaching extra felt pads on one of the legs. Unlike other reviews, I did not notice any damage when mine arrived. It took me about 30 minutes to put both stools together—super straightforward directions and no missing pieces. You will need a philips screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Asdfghjkl

customer_reviews.title: Was five stars - now one star due to quality issue
customer_reviews.text: Less than one year after this purchase, the seam on the stool cushion started to open. We will attempt to get it replaced. These are not cheap and should last longer with normal usage.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: after it was put together it looked fine with my cabinets
customer_reviews.text: Well I originally made a review and only gave a 3 Star because the expresso I felt had a touch of red. I thought about it and decided to put stool together, after it was put together it looked fine with my cabinets. One of the post broke screwing them in so be careful don’t use a power screw driver. I called customer service and they took care of me with broken part. The stools seem sturdy and just the perfect heights. As of now it’s a 5 Star I will see if they hold up good.
customer_reviews.author: sandra Andracsek

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together, quality is great. We have seen similar bar chairs in the stores for twice as much. I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: comfy, sturdy chairs
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my newly remodeled kitchen. They were very easy to assemble. The assembly instructions are pictures only, but I found them easy enough to follow and the chairs went together quickly. They are VERY comfortable and sturdy (my husband and I are both heavy people). The grey is almost a smokey grey and looks great with the white frame. We bought both these and the ones with the full backs and love them both!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Perry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and look!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and they are even more beautiful than the online picture! The white isn’t a true white which made me happier because it matched the rest of my dining room furniture better. Super Happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Guitrau

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!!! I love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: They’re perfect for my kitchen island! (I still need to stain the island) I love that the material isn’t cloth so it can be easily cleaned. I only took off one star because one stool is like a TINY bit uneven on its legs, but it’s still comfortable to sit in and oh so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great stools - great price !
customer_reviews.text: Seriously a great set of barstools - needed something that tucks under the bar but was sturdy and stylish. These surprised us so much we bought another set. They are made very well and had zero issues putting together . No wobble and will be easy for kids to climb with falling over. The padded seat is a little firm but softens quick - I know with use it will even more - love these stools and bought 2 more !
customer_reviews.author: ChristiGriff

customer_reviews.title: Angel Line Stools 👍 Companies employee who packaged defective piece👎
customer_reviews.text: Just opened box of stools after the one month return has pasted, as they were a birthday gift. One of the stools has a paint issue were you can see wood. I’m a getting frustrated with companies that pack up defective product, then let the customer deal with it! I like the stools, over all construction , quality and assembly is fine. I’m going to call Amazon to see if they will do an exception to the return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Steven benson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bar Stools
customer_reviews.text: I love my barstools! I ordered the gray wood with white seats. They're beautiful and match my island perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great style and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I’m beyond thrilled with these stools! Easy to put together (I’m female and not handy at all). They look more expensive than they were and it looks awesome at my counter top bar.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaK

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these stools
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these stools, I would have given a 5 star rating for their appearance except that there are a few loose threads on the top which should they come out will cause a problem. They did take a lot longer to arrive than we were told which nearly caused a problem since we were leaving the day after they finally arrived (a week late I might add). All in all we are pleased, they compliment our island counter area & we get compliments on themj.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kleban

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Chairs
customer_reviews.text: I am an hardcore Amazon shopper and I order things probably 3 times a week for the last 4 to 5 years. I hardly ever write reviews, but this one is worth it. I was skeptic to order furniture from Amazon, but these stool's were perfect. The cushion has great material and soft. My wife is impressed beyond reasonable doubt and I am happy. Great buy! Delivery was before expected and boxed perfectly. I don't know what else to say! Thanks...I will check out other offers
customer_reviews.author: WINTERS

customer_reviews.title: just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: for the price these are very nice stools. Took me about 20 minutes to put them both together - all connections/hardware fitted as designed. I looked at Crate and Barrel to match dining chairs for at least 3 x the price; also other online retailers for double the price. These are a great value, and fit my needs perfectly, matching my dark gray and white kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: TeresaB

customer_reviews.title: comfortable & look good
customer_reviews.text: I love them! They fit under my counter perfectly and allow someone to sit and chat while I cook! They look great with my white cabintes and black granite counter. They are nicely padded & comfortable. I would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: wine4all

customer_reviews.title: stitching is pulling apart
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter's new home. They are sturdy and look nice, but the seams are starting to come apart. They were purchased a year ago, but actually the seams began pulling apart a few months ago. Very disappointing. Hopefully the distributor will consider replacing the defective stools. The stools have been well taken care of, but in spite of this, three stools have stitching that is pulling apart. I would request that the stools either be replaced or new cushions be sent that we could replace ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Good Bar stools
customer_reviews.text: Great stools, comfortable, and love the color. only downside is they do slide on tile, if your sitting in them they do not but if you brush up against them or have toddlers they will love pushing them around the floor easily. I would recommend bottom rubber stoppers.
customer_reviews.author: rsnkain

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Stools
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and beautiful. They are the perfect height and super comfortable 29” high with cushion
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful stools and super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these stools for use in my church office at my work table. They are beautiful stools and super comfy. They are the perfect height to slip right under the table and be completely out of the way when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: BethO

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Furniture Purchase EVER
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I absolutely LOVE these stools. They're sturdy, match our kitchen perfectly (white cabinets with white/gray granite counter tops), and are surprisingly comfortable. I don't normally score many points for interior decorating skills, but my wife was very impressed with my choice on these. Would highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan F.

product_meta.title: Angel Line Cambridge Padded Saddle Stool with Cushion, 29" Set of 2, White with Gray
product_meta.description: Size:29" Set of 2| Color:White With Gray CushionThis Cambridge 29" padded stool in white with gray upholstered seat and with nail head trim is perfect for any counter space or high top table. Set of 2. Clean with Damp Cloth
feature_bullets: White finish with gray upholstered seat, set of 2
Plush cushioned seat with nail head trim
This Cambridge 29" padded stool in white with gray upholstered seat and with nail head trim is perfect for any counter space or high top table

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars264 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
